zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：震荡整理，短期观望
zh.content:
目前以太坊/美元(ETH/USD)价格处于2637.25美元附近，呈现出震荡整理的态势。当前价格在日内波动较小，表明市场尚未明确选择方向。价格未能突破前期高点，显示出短期内市场情绪的谨慎。

MACD指标显示负值(-31.099435)，这暗示短期内卖压较大，且缺乏强势反弹信号。RSI未给出明确数据，但结合当前的震荡区间，市场情绪依然偏空。SMA(20)位于2689.53，距离现价略有距离，表明短期内上行存在一定的压力。

支撑位可关注2628美元一线，这一价位附近曾出现反弹，若跌破该支撑，可能会测试更低的水平。阻力位则位于2644.39美元附近，突破后可能带动短期反弹。交易者可考虑在支撑附近寻找买入机会，但应注意避免追高。

总体而言，ETH/USD短期内维持震荡整理的格局，建议在支撑和阻力区间内操作，避免在不确定性较大的情况下进行大幅度交易。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is currently exhibiting a short-term corrective structure after failing to hold above recent highs. Price action remains below the 20-day simple moving average at 2689.53, indicating that bearish momentum still dominates the near-term trend. The tight intraday range between 2628 and 2644 suggests consolidation, but the broader structure points to a cautious market where buyers lack strong conviction to push prices higher.

From an indicator perspective, the negative MACD value around -31 highlights sustained downside momentum, even though the absence of a signal line limits crossover analysis. The unavailability of RSI data reduces visibility into overbought or oversold conditions, increasing uncertainty for momentum-based traders. However, the combination of sub-SMA pricing and a deeply negative MACD typically reflects a market that is either still correcting or attempting to form a base.

Key support is located near 2620–2600, a zone that aligns with recent intraday lows and psychological round-number interest. A clear breakdown below this area could open the door toward 2550. On the upside, initial resistance sits near 2685–2700, defined by the 20-day SMA, followed by a stronger barrier around 2750. A daily close above these levels would be required to re-establish a bullish short-term bias.

From a trading perspective, conservative participants may prefer waiting for confirmation, either a rebound from support with improving momentum or a breakout above the 20-day SMA. Short-term traders could consider range-based strategies while volatility remains compressed, keeping tight risk controls. Medium-term investors should monitor whether Ethereum can stabilize above support, as failure to do so would reinforce bearish continuation risk.
